title: RansomEye UBA Identity Baseline
description: Frozen schema for identity baselines. All fields are mandatory. Zero optional fields allowed.

baseline_id.description: Unique identifier for this baseline (UUID v4)

baseline_window_start.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of baseline window start

baseline_window_end.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of baseline window end

observed_event_types.description: Observed event types in baseline window (explicit enumeration)

observed_hosts.description: Observed host identifiers in baseline window

observed_time_buckets.description: Observed time buckets (hourly) in baseline window (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM format)

observed_privileges.description: Observed privilege identifiers in baseline window

baseline_hash.description: SHA256 hash of baseline content (for drift comparison)

immutable_hash.description: SHA256 hash of baseline record (immutability guarantee)

ledger_entry_id.description: Audit ledger entry ID for this baseline
